sp_scores.title: Exploit the White Dragon's weakness to fire attacks.
Exploit the White Dragon's weakness to lightning attacks.

tip_battle.message: The White Dragon's Icestorm is a powerful ability, kupo! Exploit its vulnerabilities to fire and lightning, and throw in some debuffs while you're at it!
tip_battle.title: White Dragon

dungeons.epilogue: Carefully skirting cracks in the ice, the Warriors of Light made their way into the depths of the Cavern of Ice and claimed the Levistone. Returning to the surface, they next went to the Ryukahn Desert where, true to the prophet's words, an ancient airship rose from the sands. Boarding the ship, the Warriors of Light took off into the sky.
dungeons.name: Cavern of Ice
dungeons.prologue: In Elfheim, the Warriors of Light learn of a buried Airship, and so proceed to the Cavern of Ice where the key to unearthing it--the Levistone--may be found.

sp_scores.title: Defeat Garland without being KO'd.

tip_battle.message: Garland doesn't have any special attacks, kupo. He's vulnerable to debuffs, though, so throw stuff at him and see what sticks!
tip_battle.title: Garland

dungeons.epilogue: The four Warriors of Light have no memory of their past, yet their arrival proved to be timely indeed. The king of Cornelia beseeched them to free his daughter Sarah from her abductor, a former royal knight named Garland who betrayed the realm he swore to protect. In the Chaos Shrine, the warriors defeated him and rescued the princess. Little did they know, this was only the first of many perilous trials they would face.
dungeons.name: Chaos Shrine
dungeons.prologue: "When darkness veils the world, four Warriors of Light shall come," spoke the prophecy. Their arrival in Cornelia began the story to begin all stories.

sp_scores.title: Defeat Garland without being KO'd.

tip_battle.message: Garland doesn't have any special attacks, kupo. He's vulnerable to debuffs, though, so throw stuff at him and see what sticks!
tip_battle.title: Garland

dungeons.epilogue: The four Warriors of Light have no memory of their past, yet their arrival proved to be timely indeed. The king of Cornelia beseeched them to free his daughter Sarah from her abductor, a former royal knight named Garland who betrayed the realm he swore to protect. In the Chaos Shrine, the warriors defeated him and rescued the princess. Little did they know, this was only the first of many perilous trials they would face.
dungeons.name: Chaos Shrine
dungeons.prologue: "When darkness veils the world, four Warriors of Light shall come," spoke the prophecy. Their arrival in Cornelia began the story to begin all stories.

sp_scores.title: Defeat Tiamat without being KO'd.

tip_battle.message: Tiamat is one mean dragon, kupo, and it's immune to fire, ice, lightning, and earth attacks! But Tiamat isn't resistant to Petrify, so try using Break to snatch victory from the jaws of dragony defeat!
tip_battle.title: Tiamat

dungeons.epilogue: The Elemental Fiend of Wind, Tiamat, who stole this land from the Lufenians four hundred years earlier, was waiting for the warriors on the topmost level of the Flying Fortress. Beating back Tiamat's savage assault, the Warriors of Light prevailed and restored the light to the last of the four Crystals.
dungeons.name: Flying Fortress
dungeons.prologue: Armed with the knowledge they obtained in Lufenia, the Warriors of Light make their way to the Mirage Tower. There, they use the Warp Cube to enter the Flying Fortress.

sp_scores.title: Exploit the Lich's weakness to holy attacks.

tip_battle.message: The Lich uses potent magic, kupo! Silence it to shut down the spells, then attack with its weakness, holy!
tip_battle.title: Lich

sp_scores.title: Defeat Marilith without being KO'd.

tip_battle.message: Marilith is immune to fire, ice, and lightning attacks, kupo! But debuffs work well, so try to Blind or or Silence her to even the odds!
tip_battle.title: Marilith

dungeons.epilogue: The Warriors of Light arrived at the Chaos Shrine 2000 years in the past, where they used the Lute from Princess Sarah to travel down into the shrine depths, fighting off the Lich and Marilith as they went.
dungeons.name: Chaos Shrine of Yore, Part 1
dungeons.prologue: With the support of the Circle of Sages, the Warriors of Light travel to the Chaos Shrine and are transported 2000 years into the past...

sp_scores.title: Exploit the Lich's weakness to fire attacks.

tip_battle.message: The Lich attacks with powerful magic, so use Magic Buster and Shell for defense, and try to Silence him if you can, kupo! Then attack with his vulnerability, fire!
tip_battle.title: Lich

dungeons.epilogue: In the innermost reaches of the Cavern of Earth, the Warriors of Light encountered an ominous orb from which the lich who had been draining the life from the earth emerged. Though hard pressed, the warriors prevailed and with the lich's defeat, restored the light of the Earth Crystal.
dungeons.name: Cavern of Earth 2
dungeons.prologue: When the warriors brandish the Earth Rod, a stone slab at the back of the vampire's room splits, revealing a stairway. Steeling their resolve, the warriors press onward.

sp_scores.title: Exploit the Kraken's weakness to lightning attacks.

tip_battle.message: Sometimes the Kraken uses its Ink ability to Blind you, so bring someone along with Blindna or Esuna to fix up your party, kupo! Attack with its weakness, lightning, but don't bother with fire or earth attacks--it's immune to those!
tip_battle.title: Kraken

dungeons.epilogue: From the mermaids, the Warriors of Light learned that the Kraken was responsible for stealing the power of the Water Crystal. As its light faded, so too did the mermaids. On the lowest level of the Sunken Temple the warriors defeated the Kraken and restored the Crystal's light. They also discovered the Rosetta Stone, an artifact that allowed Dr. Unne in Melmond to teach them to speak the language spoken in their next destination: Lufenia.
dungeons.name: Sunken Shrine
dungeons.prologue: Two hundred years ago, a shrine sank to the bottom of the sea. Now the mermaids who live there are in danger of extinction. Bearing the Oxyale to help them breathe, the Warriors of Light make for the Sunken Shrine.

sp_scores.title: Exploit the Vampire's weakness to fire attacks.
Exploit the Vampire's weakness to holy attacks.

tip_battle.message: Vampire's attacks and Gaze ability have the power to Paralyze, kupo, so have Esuna ready to remove it, or you'll have to wait it out! He's vulnerable to fire and holy, so fight back with spells like Fire and Dia!
tip_battle.title: Vampire

dungeons.epilogue: The Warriors of Light prevailed against the vampire that dwelled within the Cavern of Earth, but the rot upon the land remained. Hearing rumors of a sage named Sadda, the heroes sought an audience with the hermit who explained that the vampire was merely the servant of a being who dwelled further inside the Cavern of Earth and gave them the Earth Rod, opening their path to even greater danger...
dungeons.name: Cavern of Earth 1
dungeons.prologue: Word reaches the warriors that a vampire residing within the Cavern of Earth is responsible for the rot that plagues the land around Melmond. The warriors go to the cavern to investigate.

sp_scores.title: Afflict Astos with Silence.

tip_battle.message: The dark elf Astos uses all sorts of magical attacks. Fight back with abilities like Silence and Silence Buster to put a lid on his spells!
tip_battle.title: Astos

dungeons.epilogue: The search for the dark elf king Astos brought the warriors to a derelict castle, the sole resident of which was a king who claimed to have been deceived by the dark elf, leading to the fall of his kingdom. The warriors agreed to retrieve his lost crown from the Marsh Cave, but upon their return, the king revealed himself to be Astos and attacked! Defeating him, the warriors obtained the crystal eye that had been stolen from the witch Matoya. In exchange, she gave the party the Jolt Tonic which awakened the elven prince, thus breaking the curse.
dungeons.name: Western Keep
dungeons.prologue: Entering Elfheim, the Warriors of Light learn that the dark elf king Astos has ensorcelled the prince of the elves in a magical slumber. The search for Astos begins.

sp_scores.title: Afflict Marilith with Blind.
Afflict Marilith with Sleep.

tip_battle.message: Marilith is immune to fire, ice, and lightning--she's one tough naga, kupo! Try to debuff her with Blind, Sleep, or Silence, and attack her with anything that isn't fire, ice, or lightning!
tip_battle.title: Marilith

dungeons.epilogue: The Warriors of Light traveled to the foot of Mount Gulg by canoe. Entering the mountain, they passed through caverns flowing with magma, until they reached the final chamber. There they faced Marilith, Fiend of Fire, awoken two hundred years before her time by the destruction of the Fiend of Earth. Surviving Marilith's scorching sheets of flame, the warriors triumphed and restored the light of the Fire Crystal.
dungeons.name: Mount Gulg
dungeons.prologue: The Circle of Sages at Crescent Lake tell the warriors of the crystals and of Chaos. The Warriors of Light make their way to Mount Gulg to face the fire within.

sp_scores.title: Defeat the Kraken without being KO'd.

tip_battle.message: The Kraken has grown even more powerful, kupo, and now it doesn't have any vulnerabilities! But it still uses Ink to Blind, so have someone ready with Blindna or Esuna!
tip_battle.title: Kraken

sp_scores.title: Defeat Tiamat without being KO'd.

tip_battle.message: Tiamat is one mean dragon, kupo, and it's immune to fire, ice, lightning, and earth attacks! Tiamat has an arsenal of potent spells, so use Magic Break and Shell to lessen the incoming damage!
tip_battle.title: Tiamat

dungeons.epilogue: The Warriors of Light made their way through the Chaos Shrine, there to end the evil at its source and put the world to rights. They went downward, defeating the Kraken and Tiamat before reaching the lowest level of the shrine.
dungeons.name: Chaos Shrine of Yore, Part 2
dungeons.prologue: The battle with the two elemental fiends behind them, the Warriors of Light continue their journey downward through the Chaos Shrine, but more foes lie in wait.

sp_scores.title: Afflict Marilith with Blind.
Afflict Marilith with Sleep.

tip_battle.message: Marilith is immune to fire, ice, and lightning--she's one tough naga, kupo! Try to debuff her with Blind, Sleep, or Silence, and attack her with anything that isn't fire, ice, or lightning!
tip_battle.title: Marilith

dungeons.epilogue: The Warriors of Light traveled to the foot of Mount Gulg by canoe. Entering the mountain, they passed through caverns flowing with magma, until they reached the final chamber. There they faced Marilith, Fiend of Fire, awoken two hundred years before her time by the destruction of the Fiend of Earth. Surviving Marilith's scorching sheets of flame, the warriors triumphed and restored the light of the Fire Crystal.

dungeons.name: Cavern of Earth 2
dungeons.prologue: When the warriors brandish the Earth Rod, a stone slab at the back of the vampire's room splits, revealing a stairway. Steeling their resolve, the warriors press onward.

sp_scores.title: Exploit the Dragon Zombie's weakness to fire attacks.
Exploit the Dragon Zombie's weakness to holy attacks.

tip_battle.message: The Dragon Zombie is undead, kupo! Use fire and holy attacks to send it to the grave!
tip_battle.title: Dragon Zombie

dungeons.epilogue: The Warriors of Light headed northeast from the Dragon Caves to brave the Citadel of Trials, yet all they found on its topmost level was a rat's tail. How could this be proof of their courage? Yet, when they brought the tail back to Bahamut, the Dragon King was pleased, and granted the warriors great powers.
dungeons.name: Citadel of Trials
dungeons.prologue: In the Dragon Caves, the party faces Bahamut, the Dragon King, who tells them they must bring proof of their courage from the Citadel of Trials.

Exploit the Vampire's weakness to holy attacks.

tip_battle.message: Vampire's attacks and Gaze ability have the power to Paralyze, kupo, so have Esuna ready to remove it, or you'll have to wait it out! He's vulnerable to fire and holy, so fight back with spells like Fire and Dia!
